A

addCommand(Command) - Method in class asypad.ui.AsyPadPane
Adds a new command to the AsyPadPane.
addShape(Shape) - Method in class asypad.ui.AsyPadPane
Adds a new shape to this pane, checking whether a shape with the same name already exists.
addShapes(Shape...) - Method in class asypad.ui.AsyPadPane
Adds new shapes to this pane, checking whether a shape with the same name as each of shapes already exists.
addToAsy() - Method in class asypad.shapes.Shape
Adds this shape and all children to Asymptote code.
angleBisectorX(Point, Point, Point) - Static method in class asypad.shapes.Utility
Calculates the x-coordinate of the point that lies on the angle bisector of angle p1p2p3, and is 1 unit away from p2.
angleBisectorY(Point, Point, Point) - Static method in class asypad.shapes.Utility
Calculates the y-coordinate of the point that lies on the angle bisector of angle p1p2p3, and is 1 unit away from p2.
AsyPad - Class in asypad.ui
AsyPad: A simple drawing tool that can convert diagrams into Asymptote code.
AsyPad() - Constructor for class asypad.ui.AsyPad
Creates a new AsyPad Application that can handle .apad file opening (for Mac).
asypad.shapes - package asypad.shapes
This package contains the shapes that are used to store the shapes drawn onto the screen by the user.
asypad.shapes.labels - package asypad.shapes.labels
Package containing the draggable labels that are used in AsyPad.
asypad.shapes.types - package asypad.shapes.types
This package contains enums that specify the possible types of shapes.
asypad.ui - package asypad.ui
This package contains classes related to the user interface of AsyPad.
asypad.ui.command - package asypad.ui.command
Package that includes classes to store user commands for implementation of undo/redo features.
asypad.ui.menus - package asypad.ui.menus
This package includes classes that represent the menubars that appear in AsyPad.
AsyPadMenuBar - Class in asypad.ui.menus
AsyPad menu bar used in the AsyPad application.
AsyPadMenuBar(AsyPadPane) - Constructor for class asypad.ui.menus.AsyPadMenuBar
Creates a new AsyPad menu bar with specified parent.
AsyPadPane - Class in asypad.ui
A special drawing pane that interacts with the user and can be integrated into other JavaFX applications.
AsyPadPane() - Constructor for class asypad.ui.AsyPadPane
Creates an AsyPadPane layout.
AsyPadToolBar - Class in asypad.ui.menus
AsyPad toolbar contains all the tools for geometric construction on AsyPad.
AsyPadToolBar(AsyPadPane) - Constructor for class asypad.ui.menus.AsyPadToolBar
Creates a new AsyPad toolbar with specified parent.
